digest_items.title: Verify mobile app security
digest_items.why: Mobile apps often have unique vulnerabilities like insecure storage
digest_items.fix: Use OWASP Mobile Security Testing Guide for comprehensive testing

digest_items.title: Implement security incident response plan
digest_items.why: Prepared response reduces damage and recovery time from breaches
digest_items.fix: Document procedures, assign roles, and conduct regular drills

digest_items.title: Verify API versioning strategy
digest_items.why: Deprecated API versions may have unpatched vulnerabilities
digest_items.fix: Maintain clear deprecation timeline and force upgrades for old versions

digest_items.title: Enable audit logging
digest_items.why: Audit logs are essential for incident response and compliance
digest_items.fix: Log authentication events, data access, and configuration changes

digest_items.title: Use subresource integrity (SRI)
digest_items.why: SRI prevents compromised CDN resources from executing malicious code
digest_items.fix: Add integrity attribute to script and link tags loading external resources

digest_items.title: Disable directory listing
digest_items.why: Directory listing exposes file structure and sensitive files
digest_items.fix: Set 'Options -Indexes' in Apache or 'autoindex off' in nginx
